select nvl(max(A_REVIEW_NUM),0)+1 from A_REVIEW
insert into A_REVIEW(A_REVIEW_NUM, A_REVIEW, A_NICKNAME, A_SCORE, A_REVIEW_IMG, C_ID, A_ORDER_NUM, S_STORE_NUM) values (#{aReviewNum}, #{aReview}, #{aNickname}, #{aScore}, #{aReviewImg}, #{cId}, #{aOrderNum}, #{sStoreNum})
mapper.select: select arv.A_NICKNAME, arv.A_REVIEW_NUM, arv.S_STORE_NUM, arv.A_REVIEW, arv.A_WRITE_DATE, arv.A_SCORE, arv.A_REVIEW_IMG, arp.A_REPLY_CONTENT, arp.A_REPLY_DATE, sm.S_MENU_NAME from a_review arv left outer join a_order ao on arv.A_ORDER_NUM = ao.A_ORDER_NUM left outer join a_order_detail aod on arv.A_ORDER_NUM = aod.A_ORDER_NUM left outer join s_menu sm on aod.S_MENU_CODE = sm.S_MENU_CODE left outer join a_reply arp on arv.A_REVIEW_NUM = arp.A_REVIEW_NUM where arv.C_ID = #{cId} order by arv.A_WRITE_DATE desc
select count(*) from A_ORDER ao join A_REVIEW ar on ao.A_ORDER_NUM = ar.A_ORDER_NUM where (ao.A_ORDER_NUM=#{aOrderNum} and ao.C_ID=#{cId} and A_ORDER_STATUS='배달완료') and rownum <= 1
mapper.delete: delete from a_review where C_ID=#{cId} and A_REVIEW_NUM=#{aReviewNum}
